aircraft.value: Skyhawk Fighter - AC-3897-556 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 10/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 11/08/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 15/08/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 14/08/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 19/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
